Remove binaries & other stuff generated during build
Added main menu & PreferencesActivity
Added BootReceiver (still in progress)
Simpler Intent construction call
Fix security issue when using *printf functions and the format string is not a string literal.
Remove duplicate struct definition that is already defined in the NDK headers

Moved native code to jni/

* Renamed gogoc-android/native/ to jni/ under toplevel
* Moved gogoc-android/jni/Application.mk to jni/, and updated
APP_PROJECT_PATH accordingly

Revert 'Moved native code to jni/'

This reverts commit 845b68b4e1db86af482c32205a3541bc31b6facc.
Set preferences title to Settings

* Moved Set DNS to menu
* Added Start/Stop menu item (in progress)
* Use switch to check for clicked menu item

Avoid blocking app while connecting to gogoc

TODO: statusConnection should be moved to some sort of service
Use a single button for start/stop
Move all constants to Constants class

Move most of the gogoc control & shell methods to GogoCtl class

* Remove unused setPermission method.
* Also moved showToast & showDialog methods to GogoCtl class.

Moved statusConnection method to GogoCtl class

* Removed calls to showIndicator from statusConnection method, instead
it is called after every call for statusConnection
* In case of connection establishment, set return of statusConnection
to: established <IP6 addr>, and showIndicator method then uses
substring to print <IP6 addr> to status text box
Set address text field to focusable, to allow users to copy the IPv6 address

Added a service

BootReceiver calls GogoService on boot
Code cleanup

Added a BroadcastReceiver for connectivity state, which would call the
service to start/stop gogoc depending on the current connectivity state

* Added stateChanged method to the service interface to check the
connectivity state & accordingly start/stop gogoc
* Added override for onStartCommand method, which calls stateChanged.
Use .equals method for string comparison instead of ==
Remove BootReceiver, ConnectivityStateReceiver is sufficient
Fix IPv6 address string building

Enhanced logic to start/stop gogoc upon network status change

* Do not stop gogoc in case of failover
* Only start gogoc if auto_connect is set or gogoc was previously
connected/connecting
* Removed checkNetworkConnection method
* auto_connect setting default value is false
Set preferences file name to 'preferences'
Add a little code comment

Enhance gogoc start/stop logic

* Set lastStatus in statusConnection method
* Properly fetch shared preferences
* stop gogoc if there is no network available or: if there is no
connection attempt nor failover state.
Added TODO file

In GogoCtl methods: replaced calls to showToast with Log.d, user doesn't
really need to see those.

Added thread to monitor connection status

It ends itself if gogoc is stopped
Added offline icons

Add notification

Also try to fix thread re-invocation (in progress)

Fixed monitorConnection thread re-invocation problem

Create new thread after startGogoc call.
Update TODO list
Cancel notification in stopGogoc method

Enhancements in main activity

* Refresh menu in onPrepareMenu method
* Add startStopGogoc method, which is called by Start/Stop button and
menu item
* Remove redundant logic

Register a broadcast receiver in main activity to receive refresh UI
requests from background service
register receiver @ activity's onStart instead of onServiceConnected
Added basic gogoc settings to shared preferences (not used yet by app)

Simplified enable/disable logic for userid/passwd entries by using
Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener instead of the overhead of
registering/unregistering a SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

Main activity UI enhancements

* Display the window after connected with servie
* Move UI setup to onContentChange method
* Fix crash if attempting to open menu before being connected to service

saveConf gets config from shared preferenes

* Remove saveConf(String conf) from GogoService interface
* saveConf() is called at each startGogoc() call
TODO: a sharedPreferences listener should be implemented instead.

Changed EditText views to TextView

* Cleaned up main layout XML
Register broadcast receiver in onContentChanged method
Sent refreshUI intent for any connection status change
Note fixes/enhancements needed for connection monitoring thread
Added license header
Update README
Bumped minSdk to 5
Use dp/sp units instead of px unit
Use getNotification instead of build to get notification, for API 11 compatability
Set target API to 19
Set android:allowBackup to false
Place uses-sdk tag before application tag

New icons

* Added SVG icons with a Makefile script to generate PNG icons
* Added icons for xhdpi resolution
* Replaced old PNG icons with icons generated from SVG icons
Derive GOGOC_BIN & GOGOC_CONF from GOGOC_DIR
Bumped minSdk to 11
Added license header

Code cleanup

* Remove un-necessary logs
* Remove DEFAULT_CONF related code
Add more Log calls in service to help debugging thread
Clean strings file
Moved connected/disconnected notification strings to strings.xml
Removed some unused strings
Fix auto-reconnect decision logic
Set AUTO_CANCEL flag for the notification

Add fromConnThread parameter to statusConnection method (to be used
later)
InterruptedException is not an error case

Rename btn_dns to set_dns

Cleanup unused strings
Remove raw binary
Add project.properties
Added NEWS file
Updated TODO

Build native code for all available ABIs

* Install the native binary as assets instead of raw.
* Copy the binary corresponding to the device ABI from assets.
Update README
Release 2.0
